CHARGE
TO
LETTERS
FFG
May 4, 1961
Hon. Oren Harris, Chairman
House Interstate and Foreign Service Committee
House of Representatives
Washington, D. C.
Mississippi is intensely interested in educational TV.
Current plans are to use Channel 2 assigned to Mississippi
State University on state-wide basis. State-wide committee
currently using plans from SREB and JCET for initiating
program. Matter will probably receive legislative action
January, 1962.
Ross R. Barnett, Governor
Send the above message, subject to the terms on back hereof, which are hereby agreed to
PLEASE TYPE OR WRITE PLAINLY WITHIN BORDER-DO NOT FOLD
